title: Implement patient list view
summary: As a user, I can view a list of all patients with search and filter capabilities.
description:
Create a patient list view that displays all registered patients in a table format. Include search functionality to quickly find patients by name, ID, or other criteria. Add filtering options for status, date range, and other relevant attributes.

## Technical Details
- Server-side pagination for large datasets
- Real-time search with debouncing
- Sortable columns
- Export functionality (CSV/PDF)

## UI Requirements
- Responsive table design
- Search bar with clear button
- Filter panel (collapsible)
- Loading states
- Empty state when no patients found
acceptanceCriteria: User can see list of all patients in a table
User can search patients by name or ID
User can filter patients by status
Clicking a patient row navigates to patient detail
